long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Tabbles Chrome extension allows Tabbles users to tag bookmarks as well as files and emails. Bookmarks can be searched and grouped based on tags, along with the other objects similarly tagged.
